author: Regan Downer
message:
Merge pull request #1735 from ashyasingh/patch-2

Update bulk operations note on localization support

ai_summary.Messages:
{"content":"The following is the commit files that have changed: {
  "sha": "092de8f683f918c50351ef88982d380c8be83d9c",
  "filename": "docs/fundamentals/bulk-operations.md",
  "status": "modified",
  "additions": 2,
  "deletions": 2,

  "blob_url": "https://github.com/MicrosoftDocs/entra-docs/blob/49ae8a5828adbc6bc2a8c3c0654f73f1301b8eca/docs%2Ffundamentals%2Fbulk-operations.md",
  "raw_url": "https://github.com/MicrosoftDocs/entra-docs/raw/49ae8a5828adbc6bc2a8c3c0654f73f1301b8eca/docs%2Ffundamentals%2Fbulk-operations.md",
  "contents_url": "https://api.github.com/repos/MicrosoftDocs/entra-docs/contents/docs%2Ffundamentals%2Fbulk-operations.md?ref=49ae8a5828adbc6bc2a8c3c0654f73f1301b8eca",
  "patch": "@@ -16,7 +16,7 @@ ms.custom: it-pro\n The new bulk operations experience in Microsoft Entra ID provides enhanced capabilities for managing **Groups** and **Devices**. This service enables bulk actions including create, update, and delete operations. The improved service delivers better performance, reduces timeouts, and removes scaling limitations for large tenants.\n \n > [!NOTE] \n-> The new bulk operations service currently only supports **Groups**, **Devices**, and **Users** export. Support for additional entities like **Enterprise applications** will be added in a future update.\n+> The new bulk operations service currently only supports **Groups**, **Devices**, and **Users** export. Support for additional entities like **Enterprise applications** will be added in a future update. Localization for templates is not supported.\n \n For information about limitations and to learn more about the previous Bulk Operations experience, see [Bulk operations service limitations](bulk-operations-service-limitations.md).\n \n@@ -168,4 +168,4 @@ You can bulk export users following the steps in [Download a list of users in Mi\n \n - [Bulk operations service limitations](bulk-operations-service-limitations.md)\n - [Add or remove group members using Microsoft Entra ID](how-to-manage-groups.yml)\n-- [Bulk create users in Microsoft Entra ID](../identity/users/users-bulk-add.md)\n\\ No newline at end of file\n+- [Bulk create users in Microsoft Entra ID](../identity/users/users-bulk-add.md)"
}. Please summarise it in a few sentences, using UK grammar and ensure the response is formatted for markdown. Do not start the response with here is summary.","role":"user"}
ai_summary.Response: A change has been made to the bulk operations documentation, specifically the `docs/fundamentals/bulk-operations.md` file. The update clarifies that the new bulk operations service currently supports export for Groups, Devices, and Users, with support for additional entities like Enterprise applications to be added later. It also notes that localisation for templates is not supported.
